description: This file defines a Django custom management command that generates an OpenAPI schema using drf_yasg, executes the schema view with a mock request, and saves the resulting OpenAPI JSON to a file.

classes.name: Command
classes.description: A custom Django management command that programmatically generates and saves an OpenAPI schema.

methods.name: handle
methods.description: Handles the command execution by creating a schema view, executing it with a mock request, and saving the generated OpenAPI JSON to a file.
